alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Tuscaloosa; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walker, north central Tuscaloosa and central Fayette Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 912 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bankston, or 8 miles east of Fayette, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fayette, Berry, Oakman, Boley Springs, Bankston, Stone Wall, Richard Arthur Field, West Corona, Fayette County Public Lake, New Lexington, Bevill State College Fayette, Fowlers Crossroads and Corona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
